title: ASIET: Courses, Ranking, Fees, Placements, Scholarship, Admission 2024
meta_description: Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology - [ASIET] Kalady, Ernakulam, Kerala Application Form, Admissions, Contact, Website, Map, B.Tech, MBA, M.Tech . 18 Courses. Average Fees is 83588 per year.

Section.name: About ASIET
Section.description:
Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology is one of the prestigious technological institutes in Kerala offering NBA accredited programs (CSE, ECE, ME, EE) and having industry collaborations with the top Techno Giants and international collaborations with various universities abroad.
The ASIET has recently launched two new programs in B.Tech, namely, Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence) and Robotics and Automation. Admission for the same is based on the entrance scores. Check ASIET Admission
The institute also offers certain Add-on Certification Courses along with MBA, M.Tech and B.Tech degrees from the well recognized foreign universities and business schools. However, admission to the MBA program is purely based on the entrance examinations.
Table of Content
Check ASIET Courses & Fees
Ques. How is B.Tech CSE at ASIET?
Ans. ASIET offers an NBA accredited B.Tech Computer Science and Engineering program under the guidance of excellent faculty along with various Add-on certification courses from well recognized foreign universities. Also, the CSE placements are good enough at ASIET.
Ques. Does ASIET also offer online programs?
Ans. Adi Shankara Digital Academy has introduced a range of international online courses offering more than 30+ courses in different streams in both long term and short term.
Ques. Are students of ASIET provided scholarships or financial aid?
Ans. Scholarships are provided for meritorious as well as economically backward students. Students with high ranks in the Kerala State Entrance Exam will be given 100% tuition fee as scholarship.
Ques. What facilities are provided to the students of ASIET ?
Ans. The students at ASIET are provided the facilities of transportation, hostels, libraries, dignitaries visited and various other facilities.
Ques. How are the faculty members of ASIET?
Ans. Faculty members of ASIET are extremely experienced and highly qualified in their respective fields.
